msContents.summary: Petition from a man connected with farming of taxes who had been arrested and had already spent three years in jail, asking for his release.

msItemStruct.note: Left margin: 5 cm..; text includes deletions and interlinear corrections
The original label on this papyrus mentioned a provenance from the crocodile mummies; however, the appearance of the papyrus rather suggests it came from the cartonnage of the human mummies.
21 lines, on recto along the fibers.
Recto and verso may be two drafts of the same petition

physDesc.p: 2 papyri ; Frag. 1: 16 x 22 cm.; Frag. 2: 2.5 x 0.6 cm.
